title: 1.73 高清材質crash
author: lsm224556
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lsm224556 于 2011-7-17 16:11 编辑 

mcpatcher-2.1.0_02
mcpatcher-2.1.0_01


兩個都試了.. 

用HD材質仍然是crash 

   Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT d23e8518 --------
Generated 11年7月17日 下午4:09

Minecraft: Minecraft Beta 1.7.3
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.6.0_26, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: ATI Radeon HD 5500 Series  version 3.2.9405 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.

java.nio.BufferOverflowException
    at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.put(Unknown Source)
    at java.nio.ByteBuffer.put(Unknown Source)
    at ji.a(SourceFile:233)
    at ji.b(SourceFile:501)
    at de.a(SourceFile:125)
    at lg.a(SourceFile:164)
    at ft.a(SourceFile:68)
    at px.b(EntityRenderer.java:492)
    at EntityRendererProxy.b(EntityRendererProxy.java:14)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:781)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 4e452fc4 ----------

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 或許你安裝的某些 MOD (例如: OptiFog) 與 mcpatcher 衝突了... 找原版 Minecraft.jar 重新安裝試試... 記得安裝其他 MOD 前先看看說明, 有沒有什麼注意事項...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
步驟
1.強制更新 準備全新的minecraft.jar
2. 打補丁 打完了在加mod進去

就行了 必須要乾淨的jar

replies.author: lsm224556
replies.txt_content:
我整個MC換了....
========
可能是我以前用的那個從3DM下載的MC 有點問題...
